text: (nabiye!) niyata vasayenma api minisunge (yahapata) sandahama sampurnayenma satyayen piri mema dharmaya oba veta pahala kalemu. ebævin kavurun (meya) anugamanaya kara katayutu karanneda, ohutama eya hondaki. kavurun (eyin) margaya værada yanneda, eya ohutama napurak vasayen avasan vanu æta. (nabiye!) oba ovunva (rju margayehi yana men bala kara), bera ganneku nova
